findings.observation: High First Load JS (150kB) caused by eager loading of Hypertune SDK in RootLayout.
findings.action: Modified HypertuneProvider to dynamically import the SDK in useEffect/requestIdleCallback.
findings.expected_impact: Reduced First Load JS by ~34kB (22% reduction). This significantly reduces TBT and improves LCP on slow connections.
findings.verification: Next.js build output confirmed reduction from 150kB to 116kB for the home page route.

findings.observation: LCP element (H1 title) had 'animate-in fade-in delay-100' classes, causing a 100ms+ delay in Largest Contentful Paint.
findings.action: Removed animation classes from the H1 title in NeuraLinkBookingApp.tsx.
findings.expected_impact: LCP should improve by at least 100ms + animation duration. Text will be visible immediately upon paint.
findings.verification: Manual code review of NeuraLinkBookingApp.tsx and successful build.
